name: Suhas Daftuar
cooked:
Hi,

Thanks for taking a look at the cluster mempool proposal. I wrote up a longer post on incentive compatibility that may be of interest – I think it addresses many of the questions you’ve raised, and there is some discussion that followed that seems relevant to your suggestions as well.
raw:
Hi,

Thanks for taking a look at the cluster mempool proposal.  I wrote up a longer post on [incentive compatibility](https://delvingbitcoin.org/t/mempool-incentive-compatibility/553) that may be of interest – I think it addresses many of the questions you’ve raised, and there is some discussion that followed that seems relevant to your suggestions as well.
excerpt: Hi, Thanks for taking a look at the cluster mempool proposal. I wrote up a longer post on incentive compatibility that may be of interest – I think it addresses many of the questions you’ve raised, and there is some discussion that followed that seems relevant to your suggestions as well.
